titleInfo.title: USA v. Sanchez et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER 16 re Criminal Forfeiture, as to defendants Daniel Millan Sanchez, Jacobo Fernandez, signed by Judge Frank C. Damrell Jr. on 3/15/07. The US and its agencies, including the DEA and/or the USMS, are authorized to maintain and preserve following assets until conclusion of instant criminal case, or further Order of Court: a) approximately $13,937 in US Currency seized from 3725 Section Avenue, Stockton, CA; b) approximately $3,300 in US Currency seized from 1816 Pissarro Court, Stockton, CA. (Marciel, M)ORDER 16 re Criminal Forfeiture, as to defendants Daniel Millan Sanchez, Jacobo Fernandez, signed by Judge Frank C. Damrell Jr. on 3/15/07. The US and its agencies, including the DEA and/or the USMS, are authorized to maintain and preserve following assets until conclusion of instant criminal case, or further Order of Court: a) approximately $13,937 in US Currency seized from 3725 Section Avenue, Stockton, CA; b) approximately $3,300 in US Currency seized from 1816 Pissarro Court, Stockton, CA. (Marciel, M)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Sanchez et al
titleInfo.subTitle: STIPULATION and ORDER signed by Judge Frank C. Damrell Jr. on 3/29/07 AGREEING to the stipulation between the parties to CONTINUE the Status Conference: Status Conference RESET for 5/7/2007 at 09:30 AM in Courtroom 2 (FCD) before Judge Frank C. Damrell Jr.; 21 motion to disclose informants, 22 motion for Rule 404(b) Evidence, and 23 motion for discovery are WITHDRAWN by the dfts counsel, to be refiled at a later time, if necessary, under a schedule to be agreed upon by the parties and the court. titleInfo.title: USA v. Sanchez et al
titleInfo.subTitle: FINAL ORDER OF FORFEITURE signed by Judge Frank C. Damrell, Jr on 2/20/08 as to Daniel Millan Sanchez, Jacobo Fernandez ORDERING that a final order of forfeiture shall be entered forfeiting to the United States all right, title and interest in listed property. The US Marshal shall maintain custody of and control over the property until it is disposed of according to the law. (Dillon, M)FINAL ORDER OF FORFEITURE signed by Judge Frank C.
